SEARCH

Package Services

package Services
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ClearAppService
    clears the database of all usernames, games and authorization tokens
    CreatGameService
    Class creates and stores a game using the GameDAO and its methods
    JoinGameService
    Verifies that the specified game exists, and, if a color is specified, adds the caller as the requested color to the game.
    ListGamesService
    Class calls the necessary functions from authDAO and GameDAO to perform the request
    LoginService
    class uses a request and calls methods from authDAO to create an auth token and store it in the Database
    LogoutService
    class instantiates a method form the AuthDAO in order to fulfill the request
    RegisterService
    Service will register a new user and store that information in the Database
